snippet.title: Gravastar Demo Gameplay (6/9/18)
snippet.description:
***This is a work-in-progress and not representative of final build.*

Gravastar is a sci-fi fantasy JRPG (Japanese-style Role Playing Game) for PC and consoles that combines a traditional JRPG aesthetic with a unique and fast-paced turn-based battle system inspired by arcade fighting games. The battle system in Gravastar is set apart from traditional, turn-based JRPGs by it’s real-time button-combo input system. Alter the flow of battle, master your character's movesets, build enormous combos, and string together chains to dispatch your foes.

WEB: http://www.gravastargame.com
TWITTER: https://www.twitter.com/StudioAtma
